24.02.text:
Greetings everyone, and welcome to Spacing
Out! I'm Jason McClellan.

27.29.text:
And I'm Maureen Elsberry. Thanks for joining
us.

29.36.text:
We took a few weeks off because of the holidays
and because we're wildly

32.95.text:
busy preparing for the 2014 International

so we can get you caught up on some of the

45.71.text:
According to a new study, researchers believe
that Earth-sized planets

48.64.text:
can support life at least ten times farther
away from their host stars than previously

53.71.text:
Researchers from the University of Aberdeen
and the University of St

56.33.text:
Andrews recently published a paper asserting
that cold rocky planets previously

60.61.text:
considered inhospitable to life as we know
it may actually be habitable beneath the

65.19.text:
surface. Phys.org explains that the team of
researchers "created a computer model that

69.99.text:
estimates the temperature below the surface
of a planet of a given size, at a given

75.51.text:
The abstract for the paper explains that the
team looked at life on Earth,

79.26.text:
pointing out that Earth has a deep biosphere.
So why not include subsurface

83.07.text:
environments on other worlds when considering
habitability? Subsurface liquid water

87.74.text:
maintained by internal planetary heat could
potentially support life well outside

94.35.text:
So the team introduced a new term: subsurface-habitability
zone, which

98.20.text:
denotes the range of distances from a star
in which "rocky planets are habitable at any

102.91.text:
depth below their surfaces up to a stipulated
maximum, and show how [subsurface-

107.45.text:
habitability zones] can be estimated from
a model relating temperature, depth and

112.69.text:
PhD student Sean McMahon, one of the team's
members, explains that

116.11.text:
"The deepest known life on Earth is 5.3 km
below the surface, but there may well be

121.38.text:
life even 10 km deep in places on Earth that
haven't yet been drilled." He continues,

126.58.text:
"Using our computer model we discovered that
the habitable zone for an Earth-like

130.75.text:
planet orbiting a sun-like star is about three
times bigger if we include the top five

135.07.text:
kilometres below the planet surface . . . If
we go deeper, and consider the top 10 km

140.24.text:
below the Earth's surface, then the habitable
zone for an Earth-like planet is 14 times

145.17.text:
According to Phys.org, our solar system's
current habitable zone extends out

148.99.text:
as far as Mars, but taking subsurface habitability
into account, "this re-drawn habitable

154.09.text:
zone would see the zone extend out farther
than Jupiter and Saturn."

158.27.text:
The team's recent paper was published in the
journal Planetary and Space Science.

161.96.text:
A crop circle recently appeared in Salinas
Valley, near Monterey,

166.03.text:
California. The BBC reported that two friends
discovered the crop circle just before

170.20.text:
sunrise on Monday, December 30th. They claimed
they noticed strange bursts of green

174.56.text:
lights while driving south of Salinas. So
they pulled over, started recording video,

180.37.text:
The formation had a large ring on the perimeter,
with three circles of various

184.25.text:
sizes on it. Inside the circle was a square
shaped object with other strange shapes. The

189.09.text:
next day, stories emerged about braille experts
reporting that the formation repeated the

192.70.text:
numbers 192 over and over in braille. Other
people noticed that circles on the perimeter

197.94.text:
of the ring were at the 1, 9, and 2 positions
on a clock.

201.57.text:
A local resident told NBC affiliate KSBW,
"I'm a skeptic, but this could be

207.04.text:
aliens, I don't know. I'm always willing to
believe something, so I mean, and if there's

211.21.text:
proof, you can't deny proof, but right now
it looks like aliens to me." But crop circle

216.27.text:
researcher Nancy Talbott immediately suspected
the design was man-made. She told

220.94.text:
the Monterrey Herald, "It looks very mechanical
. . . It doesn't look the way most of the

224.96.text:
genuine circles I've worked on look. That
doesn't mean I'm right." British crop circle

229.35.text:
expert Colin Andrews was also skeptical. He
said he thought it might be a publicity

233.73.text:
It turns out that both Talbott and Andrews
were correct. On January 5th, the

238.15.text:
Nvidia Corporation wrote a blog explaining
how they hired crop circle makers to create

242.03.text:
the formation. They wrote, "We simply couldn't
think of any other way to explain that

246.00.text:
our new Tegra K1 processor, with 192 graphics
cores, can do things no other

251.26.text: technology - on this planet, at least - could."

254.32.text:
The blog also says the company was surprised
by how much press their

257.38.text:
crop circle got. They stated, "While we were
hoping to get the word . . . we didn't realize

262.13.text:
how big this thing would get. The story quickly
went global, with websites and

265.96.text:
television stations as far away as Mongolia
and Hungary reporting the story."

270.57.text:
Nvidia also posted a video explaining how
and why they created the circle,

274.46.text:
along with a healthy amount of promotion for
their new processor. That video can be

278.23.text: seen on our website at OpenMinds.tv.

280.92.text:
Travel was recently disrupted at Bremen airport
in northwestern Germany

284.70.text: when a UFO appeared multiple times on radar.

287.80.text:
According to German news site The Local, the
UFO showed up on the radar

291.13.text:
at Bremen Airport several times between 6:30
p.m. and 9:30 p.m. on Monday, January

295.32.text:
6th. But the unidentified object was also
reportedly seen by air traffic controllers

299.51.text:
in the
airport's tower, as well as by police officers.

303.25.text:
The object was estimated to be flying at a
height of approximately 1,000 feet.

307.13.text:
Once police had been alerted to the UFO's
presence, they attempted to

310.22.text:
intercept and identify the craft. A police
helicopter searched the area where the aerial

314.73.text:
object had been reported, but the UFO could
not be located.

318.21.text:
Because of the UFO's presence in Bremen airspace,
The Local reports that "a

321.69.text:
flight from Frankfurt had to be canceled and
a second flight from Munich was diverted

325.46.text:
to Hannover," while "another plane coming
from Paris had to stay airborne for a while

330.24.text:
Although no physical description accompanied
the original reports, media

334.19.text:
outlets later amended stories to include witness
descriptions stating that the object

338.25.text:
"looked like a plane but was a lot louder."
And, according to The Local, a spokesperson

343.13.text:
from German Air Traffic Control described,
"It had normal lights, red and green, and

347.66.text:
an
approach light on both sides."

349.38.text:
Authorities in Bremen have been unsuccessful
in identifying the

354.65.text:
An Iranian news agency alleges that documents
provided by former

358.30.text:
National Security Agency contractor Edward
Snowden prove that "an

363.34.text:
alien/extraterrestrial intelligence agenda
is driving US domestic and international

368.11.text:
policy, and has been doing so since at least
1945."

372.04.text:
The Fars News Agency asserts that the shadow
alien government running

375.36.text:
the United States is based in Nevada, and
these aliens previously ran Nazi Germany.

380.27.text:
The Washington Post reports, "As proof that
aliens were secretly behind the Nazis, the

384.83.text:
report explains that Germany built hundreds
of submarines toward the end of the war,

388.81.text:
far more than would have been possible with
mere human technology." But the Post

393.35.text:
continues, "It does not explain why aliens
with access to interstellar travel built subs

398.25.text:
that were so grossly incapable against the
British navy, or why all-powerful

402.51.text:
extraterrestrials were unable to help the
Nazis resist an invasion by Allied forces

407.16.text:
that
are mere cavemen relative to their own technology.

410.62.text:
So far, these are pretty
unimpressive aliens."

412.84.text:
It was apparently after losing the war that
these aliens established themselves as the

417.07.text: secret controllers of the United States government.

419.59.text:
Fars News claims that Snowden provided documents
proving these

422.32.text:
allegations to Russia's Federal Security Service
(FSB). And Fars News further asserts

428.29.text:
that the claims were recently confirmed by
Canada's former minister of defence Paul

432.83.text:
The news agency alleges that Hellyer was given

435.83.text:

It was reportedly shortly after this

444.73.text:
aliens have visited Earth for thousands of
years, and that several are working with the

449.65.text:
But Hellyer's statements on SophieCo are hardly

453.32.text:
seen documents acquired by FSB from Edward
Snowden. Hellyer has been outspoken

458.03.text:
about his extraterrestrial beliefs for years.
He even spoke about these same issues at

462.79.text:
the 2013 Citizen Hearing on Disclosure at
the National Press Club in Washington, DC.

468.34.text:
According to Fars News, Russian authorities

471.57.text:
"confirmation" that extraterrestrials controlling

475.58.text:
the same extraterrestrial race behind Nazi

and I think this is kind of a ridiculous story
